dict.acceptation: 允许；承认；给予；准许（做某事）；

sent.orig: Therefore do not judge beloved; allow all others their life choices and allow yourself yours.
sent.trans: 因此不要去判断，亲爱的；允许其他一切生命去选择，同样地，也这样允许你自己。

sent.orig: Note the Allow blank cells option under the Allow list.
sent.trans: 注意允许列表下面的允许空白单元格选项。

sent.orig: It does not allow for fumigation. It does not allow for any alternative disposal methods.
sent.trans: 它并未考虑到熏蒸处理，也未考虑任何其他替代的处理方法。

sent.orig: It's fine to allow for a snack break and also to allow for stretching breaks.
sent.trans: 允许暂停一下吃零食或者舒展身体是好的。

sent.orig: Never allow present liberalism, never allow anarchism.
sent.trans: 决不允许出现自由主义，不能发生无政府主义。
